tool_description: Exports database statistics data to various formats for reporting, backup, and external analysis purposes.

statistics_data.description: JSON string containing statistics data to export

output_path.description: File path where exported data will be saved

include_metadata.description: Whether to include collection metadata in export

compress_output.description: Whether to compress the exported file

error_messages: Invalid statistics data: Statistics data must be valid JSON format.
Invalid export format: Use one of [json, csv, xml, sql].
Invalid output path: Output path is not accessible or writable.
Export failed: Unable to write to specified output path due to permissions or disk space.
Data format error: Statistics data does not match expected schema for export.
usage: Provide statistics_data, export_format, and output_path to export statistics. Optionally enable include_metadata for comprehensive exports and compress_output for large datasets.

exported_file_path.description: Full path to the exported file

file_size_bytes.description: Size of the exported file in bytes
